mapper.sql: a.id, a.isbn AS "isbn", a.book_name AS "name", a.book_author AS "author", a.remarks, a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date, a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date, a.del_flag
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book( id, isbn, book_name, book_author, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{isbn}, #{name}, #{author}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE book SET isbn = #{isbn}, book_name=#{name}, book_author=#{author}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
